POWERED by FUSION

An individual post follows.

Better Than Offing Roaches

The program for this year’s Recent Advances in Intrusion Detection (RAID) conference looks mighty interesting, and student registration is a fairly reasonable $150 (hear that O’Reilly?! You’d get my business at that price, but find me a “student” who can afford $600 conference passes!). A trip to Pittsburgh may just be in my future.

—Aug 01, 2003
